issues.message: [Sensitive data](1) is sent to another window without origin restriction.

rule.name: js/cross-window-information-leak
rule.short_description: Cross-window communication with unrestricted target origin
rule.full_description: When sending sensitive information to another window using `postMessage`, the origin of the target window should be restricted to avoid unintentional information leaks.

issues.message: Iframe loaded using unencrypted connection.

rule.name: js/functionality-from-untrusted-source
rule.short_description: Inclusion of functionality from an untrusted source
rule.full_description: Including functionality from an untrusted source may allow an attacker to control the functionality and execute arbitrary code.

issues.message: Iframe loaded using unencrypted connection.

rule.name: js/functionality-from-untrusted-source
rule.short_description: Inclusion of functionality from an untrusted source
rule.full_description: Including functionality from an untrusted source may allow an attacker to control the functionality and execute arbitrary code.

issues.message: Using addition on a [cryptographically secure random number](1) produces biased results.

rule.name: js/biased-cryptographic-random
rule.short_description: Creating biased random numbers from a cryptographically secure source
rule.full_description: Some mathematical operations on random numbers can cause bias in the results and compromise security.

issues.message: This suffix check is missing a length comparison to correctly handle indexOf returning -1.

rule.name: js/incorrect-suffix-check
rule.full_description: Using indexOf to implement endsWith functionality is error-prone if the -1 case is not explicitly handled.

issues.message: This suffix check is missing a length comparison to correctly handle indexOf returning -1.

rule.name: js/incorrect-suffix-check
rule.full_description: Using indexOf to implement endsWith functionality is error-prone if the -1 case is not explicitly handled.

issues.message: '[https://gd.games](1)' may be followed by an arbitrary host name.

rule.name: js/incomplete-url-substring-sanitization
rule.full_description: Security checks on the substrings of an unparsed URL are often vulnerable to bypassing.

issues.message: This creates a timer with a user-controlled duration from a [user-provided value](1).

rule.name: js/resource-exhaustion
rule.full_description: Allocating objects or timers with user-controlled sizes or durations can cause resource exhaustion.

issues.message: This replaces only the first occurrence of '|'.

rule.name: js/incomplete-sanitization
rule.full_description: A string transformer that does not replace or escape all occurrences of a meta-character may be ineffective.

issues.message: This assignment may alter Object.prototype if a malicious '__proto__' string is injected from [library input](1).

rule.name: js/prototype-polluting-assignment
rule.full_description: Modifying an object obtained via a user-controlled property name may lead to accidental mutation of the built-in Object prototype, and possibly escalate to remote code execution or cross-site scripting.

issues.message: This uses a cryptographically insecure random number generated at [Math.random()](1) in a security context.

rule.name: js/insecure-randomness
rule.full_description: Using a cryptographically weak pseudo-random number generator to generate a security-sensitive value may allow an attacker to predict what value will be generated.

issues.message: This part of the regular expression may cause exponential backtracking on strings starting with ' * @param {{' and containing many repetitions of '}}\t * @param {{'.

rule.name: js/redos
rule.full_description: A regular expression that requires exponential time to match certain inputs can be a performance bottleneck, and may be vulnerable to denial-of-service attacks.

issues.message: This part of the regular expression may cause exponential backtracking on strings starting with ' * @param {{}}' and containing many repetitions of '\t * @param {{}}'.

rule.name: js/redos
rule.full_description: A regular expression that requires exponential time to match certain inputs can be a performance bottleneck, and may be vulnerable to denial-of-service attacks.

issues.message: Outbound network request depends on [file data](1).

rule.name: js/file-access-to-http
rule.short_description: File data in outbound network request
rule.full_description: Directly sending file data in an outbound network request can indicate unauthorized information disclosure.

issues.message: The [URL](1) of this request depends on a [user-provided value](2).

rule.name: js/client-side-request-forgery
rule.full_description: Making a client-to-server request with user-controlled data in the URL allows a request forgery attack against the client.

issues.message: Postmessage handler has no origin check.

rule.name: js/missing-origin-check
rule.full_description: Missing origin verification in a `postMessage` handler allows any windows to send arbitrary data to the handler.

rule.name: js/remote-property-injection
rule.full_description: Allowing writes to arbitrary properties of an object may lead to denial-of-service attacks.

issues.message: Write to file system depends on [Untrusted data](1).

rule.name: js/http-to-file-access
rule.full_description: Writing network data directly to the file system allows arbitrary file upload and might indicate a backdoor.

issues.message: This command depends on an unsanitized [command-line argument](1).

rule.name: js/indirect-command-line-injection
rule.full_description: Forwarding command-line arguments to a child process executed within a shell may indirectly introduce command-line injection vulnerabilities.
